attributes.action: Get Ladbaby, Mark & Rox, recognised for a New Years honour.
attributes.additional_details: Mark and Rox are sometimes overlooked by the media, and I feel to honour them in this way gives the credit and recognition they deserve. It also raises further awareness of those struggling to afford life's basic necessities.
attributes.background: Ladbaby, Mark and Rox, have raised tens of thousands of pounds for The Trussell Trust. They deserve to be recognised in the New Years Honours for their amazing work, not only for this massive achievement, but for the fun, light, love and laughter they bring to a sometimes dark world.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
